item.title: Books
item.description: Our donation packages include the following wonderful books related to Down syndrome. We’ll Paint the Octopus Red, by Stephanie Stuve-Bodeen 47 Strings: Tessa’s Special Code, by Becky Carey You Are Enough: A Book about Inclusion, by Margaret O’Hair My Friend Isabelle, by Eliza Woloson

item.title: Dolls
item.description: Our donation packages include this wonderful doll from a company called Miniland. It’s important to us that all children have access to dolls that look like them, so we include dolls of different races and genders with each donation.

item.title: Welcome to Maddie's Library
item.description: Maddie’s Library is dedicated to providing preschools in Northeast Missouri with books about Down Syndrome in order to create a more inclusive environment for all children. Donate here!

item.title: About
item.description: Project HAPPIE is dedicated to providing preschools with books and toys related to Down syndrome to create a more inclusive environment for all children. This project started as a way to celebrate World Down Syndrome Day, March 21st. (People with Down syndrome have 3 copies of the 21st chromosome, so 3/21 is a great day to celebrate them!) Every year, our family celebrates our wonderful daughter, who was born with Down syndrome.

item.title: Donate
item.description: Project HAPPIE is dedicated to providing preschools in Northeast Missouri with books about Down Syndrome in order to create a more inclusive environment for all children. Donate here!

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please contact us at the above, and we’ll be glad to get back to you.

item.title: Party Down for Down Syndrome!
item.description: Join us on October 1st, 2022 from 4-6 PM at Rotary Park in Kirksville for our first annual Party Down for Down Syndrome event!
